branchItem.name: HEC-A, Thermoelectric Chiller, Air Cooled
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Cooling capacity: 230W, 600W <LI>Temperature range setting: 10 to 60°C <LI>Temperature stability: ±0.03°C or better depending on load stability <LI>Power supply requirement: single phase 100 ~ 240 VAC, 50/60Hz <LI>Circulating fluid: Clear water <LI>Standards: CE, UL, RoHS </LI></UL>

branchItem.name: HEC-W5, Thermoelectric Chiller, Water Cooled, 140W, 320W
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Cooling capacity: 140 W, 320 W <LI>Temperature range setting: 10 to 60°C <LI>Temperature stability: ±0.03°C or better depending on load stability <LI>Power supply requirement: single phase 100 ~ 240 VAC, 50/60Hz <LI>Circulating fluid: Clear water or 20% ethylene glycol <LI>Standards: CE, UL, RoHS </LI></UL>

branchItem.name: HEC-W2, Thermoelectric Chiller, Water Cooled, 600W, 1200W
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Cooling capacity: 600 W, 1200 W <LI>Temperature range setting: 10 to 60°C <LI>Temperature stability: ±0.03°C or better depending on load stability <LI>Power supply requirement: single phase 200 ~ 220 VAC, 50/60Hz <LI>Circulating fluid: Clear water or fluorinated fluid <LI>Standards: CE </LI></UL>
